data.speaker: Help desk
data.message: This is PERSON_LASTNAME_1 from SMU Libraries. How may I help you?

data.speaker: Help desk
data.message: Sure! Just follow the guide on citations for social media:https://researchguides.smu.edu.sg/c.php?g=421741&p=6627441#s-lg-box-21085112

data.speaker: Help desk
data.message: Since you created a graph, you probably will need to add the citations as attribution statement below your graph

data.speaker: Help desk
data.message: So, overall it will appear as something on this guide:https://researchguides.smu.edu.sg/c.php?g=421741&p=6627445

data.speaker: Help desk
data.message: No problem! The yellow highlight part is where you can put the in-text citations of these four IG profiles
